Articles.Content: I built a rocket and noticed that some of the thrusters were running out of fuel unexpectedly early. When I went back to vehicle assembly I noticed that some of the fuel tanks connected to it have no fuel in them. Is there any reason for this? They are connected by an outgoing fuel line to another thruster in the center of the rocket.

Thats the new tweakables feature i think. just click on the bar that says the fuel level and you can adjust the level as you want.

(p.s., i think this goes in the gameplay questions forum.)

I feel a fool yet again, it was as you say. Also sorry I posted in the wrong section, I'm new and won't make the mistake again.

Edited January 4, 2014 by steelgrey
Spelling mistake
Don't worry about it steelgrey, it's not a big deal
Many items are now tweakable, in the vab. Glad you worked it out.
